Item.Risk_Statement: Users are not notified when their account was used to access the resource.
Item.Description: The information system notifies the user, upon successful logon (access) to the system, of the date and time of the last logon (access).
Item.Example: Users are notified of the date, time, and IP address of their last access.
Item.Agency_Implementation: Where the information resource provides such a facility, users shall be notified of the last successful login to the system with the user's identifier.
